main_definition: Individuals who systematically investigate, study, or explore a subject matter to gain new knowledge or understand existing information better.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Academic professionals specializing in specific fields of study
meanings_and_examples.example: The medical researchers at the university are studying the effects of a new drug on diabetes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Individuals conducting investigations or experiments to gather data and information
meanings_and_examples.example: A team of archaeologists are conducting fieldwork, unearthing artifacts at an ancient site.

meanings_and_examples.definition: People engaged in exploring new ideas or theories in their respective fields
meanings_and_examples.example: The group of theoretical physicists is working on developing a new model for understanding black holes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Experts who analyze data and draw conclusions to provide insights into various topics
meanings_and_examples.example: Market researchers analyzed consumer trends to help businesses understand their target audience better.
